name: workflow-telemetry-rust
description: Monitor CPU and memory usage during GitHub Actions workflow execution

scripts.build: ncc build src/index.js -o dist/main && ncc build src/post.js -o dist/post && mv dist/main/index.js dist/index.js && mv dist/post/index.js dist/post.js && rm -rf dist/main dist/post

author: ke-kawai
